contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 4, 1903 D New Zealand National Championships (A Grade)
New Zealand National Championships (A Grade) 10 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest New Zealand National Championships new-zealand-national-championships-a-grade
New Zealand
A Grade
Test Piece Contest
Le Domino Noir [arr. Swift]
Town Hall, Masterton, Wellington, New Zealand Second selection: 'Un Ballo in Maschera' (arr. Ord Hume)
We believe they used a test March in those days (own choice of music for the march only coming in in the 1920s). In this case it was Rimutaka - specially composed for the event by Charles Trussell (Nelson Garrison Band soon to move to Waihi Federal)
Aug. 13, 2012, 2:07 p.m. Oct. 1, 2016, 8:53 p.m.
